about_the_game:
King of Escape Adventures is a 2D platform game that challenges you to face your skills against different styles of traps and enemies inside a prison that at all costs does not want you to escape.

Main Features

10 Challenging Levels - Moving platforms and traps with enemies everywhere

Use your skills - Attack, Shield, Double Jump and Dash.

Unique Special Ability - Use your invulnerability ability to help you against more challenging enemies to manage your time

10 Soundtracks - Exciting sound effects with each new background change

Achievement Challenge - Recover achievements by collecting coins and others hidden throughout the map.

Time Challenge - Fight against the clock, if you don't find your hourglass your time runs out and you are defeated

(Generic Controller)

Forward D-Pad - Walk forward

Backward D-Pad - Walk backward

Button 1 - Attack

Button 2 - (Double click while jumping) Side Dash

Button 3 - Shield

Button 4 - Jump / Double Jump

RT - Dash Up

LT - Special Ability

(Xbox Controller)

Forward D-Pad - Walk forward

Backward D-Pad - Walk backward

A - Attack

X - (Double click while jumping) Side Dash

B - Shield

Y - Jump / Double Jump

RB - Dash Up

LB - Special Ability

short_description: Challenge yourself in a 2D platform game where you are confined in a secret prison with all your enemies defeated and seek to escape to regain your title. Walk, jump, defend yourself and attack to overcome obstacles and find the exit. Challenge your mind and escape before time runs out!
